ing: 2 (12 fluid ounce) cans or bottles lemon-lime flavored carbonated beverage
des: "If you love posh cocktails but can't afford to make them. This is a great way to impress your friends and they will never know you cheaped out on the beverages! Use the most inexpensive ingredients you can find; you will be surprised at how much better it tastes."
ins: Pour 1/2 jigger peach schnapps into each of 4 champagne flutes. Fill each glass halfway with champagne; top with lemon-lime soda. Drop a peach slice into each glass.
